LanguageData.CAL_ConvertBronze.label: Convert bronze to steel
LanguageData.CAL_ConvertBronze.description: Convert bronze ingots into steel for general crafting purposes. Makes 4 steel.
LanguageData.CAL_ConvertAluminum.label: Convert aluminum alloys to steel
LanguageData.CAL_ConvertAluminum.description: Convert duralumin or zamak ingots into steel for general crafting purposes. Makes 4 steel.
LanguageData.CAL_MakePlumchalcum.label: smelt plumchalcum
LanguageData.CAL_MakePlumchalcum.description: Use intense heat to melt and mix metals, creating plumchalcum. Makes 10 ingots.

LanguageData.CAL_MakeDuralumin.description: Use intense heat to melt and mix metals, creating duralumin. Makes 10 ingots.

LanguageData.CAL_MakeBronze.description: Use intense heat to melt and mix metals, creating bronze. Makes 10 ingots.
